title: Remote Virus & Malware Removal
headline: Remove threats without anyone stepping foot inside.
description: We detect and remove viruses, malware, spyware, and rootkits remotely using industry-standard tools and secure access.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Modern malware often hides in memory, startup tasks, or user profiles where antivirus tools fail to detect it.
Some infections survive reboots, resets, or even OS reinstallations if the system is not fully cleaned.
Remote removal can be just as thorough as in-person service when proper tools and techniques are used.

sections.heading: What We Remove
items: Viruses, worms, trojans, and remote access backdoors
Rogue toolbars, bloatware, and fake system utilities
Keyloggers, clipboard monitors, and tracking scripts
Persistent malware like rootkits and bootkits that resist normal removal methods

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: Remote malware removal is available for local clients enrolled in a support plan. We install and configure our secure remote access tool during an on-site visit. After that, we can clean your system remotely when you request help. All sessions are permission-based and fully transparent.
